page.title: 02CHEDZOY CONT.
page.content: OTHER AMENITIES ARE A POSTBOX FROM WHICH COLLECTIONS ARE MADE MORNING AND AFTERNOON ON WEEKDAYS, ONCE IN THE MORNING ON A SATURDAY AND NO COLLECTION ON SUNDAYS OR BANK HOLIDAYS.THERE IS ONE PHONE BOX.FOUR SCHOOL BUSES SERVE THE VILLAGE.PUPILS GO TO BAWDRIP INFANT SCHOOL,CHEDZOY JUNIOR SCHOOL,SYDENHAM SECONDARY SCHOOL AND ST.JOSEPH'S ROMAN CATHOLIC SCHOOL.SOME PUPILS GO TO ST.JOHN'S C.OF E. PRIMARY SCHOOL,CHILTON TRINITY AND HAYGROVE COMPREHENSIVES IN BRIDGWATER AND CRISPIN SCHOOL IN STREET. THERE IS A PLAYING FIELD IN PIG LANE.IT HAS A WIRE FENCE ALL AROUND FOR SAFETY.SOMERSET C.C. WORKMEN CUT THE GRASS AND MARK THE PITCHES FOR FOOTBALL,ROUNDERS AND CRICKET.SOON THERE WILL BE A SWING,SLIDE AND CLIMBING APPARATUS.
